title: Rank disappeared
body:
The league of legends client no longer shows my rank (it stopped about a week ish ago) or that of one of my friends. All it displays is my wins and losses in ranked, and shows me as unranked (be pretty hard to be unranked with 900+ games). Anyways, has anyone else had this issue? 

How it used to look: https://gyazo.com/4327b2fbaf6bf7a22ef7cb541afa30dd

How it looks now: https://gyazo.com/d4ba80797500fc77622ee2ecc06e9b14

replies.body: Same with me my rank disappeared. I have to do 10 matches again to get placement but all the hard work is unaccounted for. I think it might be because I left a team. That is the only action from my side otherwise its just another Riot stuff-up. I want a skin or some gift for this

i'm use to be Gold 5 and i did play rank sometime, but right now i did become unrank by no reason. on my leagues say i am still gold, but somehow it's show other player that i am unrank. how can i get reward if i become unrank

Hey Sigha,

Would you mind shooting a ticket over to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a better look into your account? ^-^
After checking the significant majority of my friends list myself and one other were the only two who it happened to. It's not because of end of season, because it happened before then.
No? It disappeared a while ago. Like, a week before the season ended.
its supposed to until they finish handing out prizes

Ahahhaha funny joke... 

Your joking right? o_o
